SEARCH
Package net.replaceitem.reconfigure.api.serializer

Interface SerializerBuilder<SELF extends SerializerBuilder<SELF,S,C>,S extends Serializer<?,C>,C>

All Known Subinterfaces:
JsonSerializerBuilder, NbtSerializerBuilder, PropertiesSerializerBuilder
All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonSerializerBuilderImpl, NbtSerializerBuilderImpl, PropertiesSerializerBuilderImpl, SerializerBuilderImpl
public interface SerializerBuilder<SELF extends SerializerBuilder<SELF,S,C>,S extends Serializer<?,C>,C>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    S
    build()
    Finishes building the serializer
    SELF
    preLoad(Consumer<C> preLoad)
    Adds a preload middleware to the serializer.
    SELF
    preWrite(Consumer<C> preWrite)
    Adds a prewrite middleware to the serializer.

  • Method Details

    • preLoad

      SELF preLoad(Consumer<C> preLoad)
      Adds a preload middleware to the serializer. This is run just before data is loaded from disk into the config. This can be used to migrate old config data to a new format.
      Parameters:
      preLoad - The consumer for the preload middleware
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining
      See Also:
      • Serializer

    • preWrite

      SELF preWrite(Consumer<C> preWrite)
      Adds a prewrite middleware to the serializer. This is run just before data is saved to disk after it has been read from the config.
      Parameters:
      preWrite - The consumer for the prewrite middleware
      Returns:
      The builder for chaining
      See Also:
      • Serializer

    • build

      S build()
      Finishes building the serializer
      Returns:
      The build serializer instance. This should be provided to ConfigBuilder.serializer(Serializer)
